name: DvG : Conquering Giants Demo
summary: Prepare for the ultimate battle against the most notorious giant Goliath! DvG is an imaginative twist on the classic story of David versus Goliath. In this epic virtual reality game, YOU are the young shepherd boy on a journey to protect your sheep from the dangers of the outside world. You better be quick on your feet because there are lions and wolves and bears nearby! Armed with a simple yet powerful sling, you’ll face challenges around every corner. They are sneaking through green pastures, lurking...
